responsibel.description: Responsible user at the portfolio owner

contactPerson.description: Contact person at the customer side

sortName.description: Sort name. Is normally the same as Name

invoiceFee.description: Not used. Default Invoice fee for contracts is set via selected contract type and/or payment method

reminderFee.description: Not used. Reminder fee is set at reminder text level

overDueDebitType.description: Overdue Interest calculation method.0=Nominal interest + additional %;1=Defined %;2=Default Value interest table rate + additional %;3=Fee and Interest means that a fee is charged up to a selected number of days and interest thereafter for late payments. Used as suggested value when new contracts are registered

overDueInterestRate.description: Overdue interest rate. Interacts with OverDue Debit Type. Defines either the additional % for methods 0 & 2, or the actual % to be used for method 1. Used as suggested value when new contracts are registered.

overDueGraceDays.description: Overdue grace days. Extra Day span before selected when reminder proposal is created. I.e. this day value is added to the due date during the reminder processing, when invoices are processed and evaluated. Used as suggested value when new contracts are registered

reminderGraceDays.description: Reminder grace days. Extra Day span before selected when reminder proposal is created. I.e. this day value is added to the due date during the reminder processing, when invoices are processed and evaluated. Used as suggested value when new contracts are registered.

creditLimit.description: Can be used to limit the contract amounts that are allowed for a customer

creditLimitDate.description: Can be used to restrict contract approval after the defined date

invoiceAddressReminder.description: Invoice address reminder. Facilitates customer unique reminder processing. Requires adaption before use. 0=Send to Customer; 1=Send to Invoice Address

extra.description: Extra. Only applicable if CustomerModification AVR/CAB is in use (normally not used). This will expose the Extra field in the Customer forms where an identification code given to the customer used for Direct Debit (RID) to Bank shall be entered

parentNumber.description: Parent number for risk reporting purposes. Has only informative purpose

marcoRef.description: The Business Partner number at the external part that ProFinance interacts with. Normally set automatically by the CreateContract interface

sundry.description: Sundry. Optional text field named sundry in GUI. A field that can be used arbitrarily

reminderGroup.description: Reminder group. Reminder group for a specific customer

riskCode.description: Risk code. Risk code set by using the sub-form risk classification in the customer registration/maintenance routines

statusCode.description: Status code. Status code set by using the sub-form risk classification in the customer registration/maintenance routines

bankCode.description: Bank code set by using the sub-form risk classification in the customer registration/maintenance routines

estYear.description: Year of establishment set by using the sub-form risk classification in the customer registration/maintenance routines

creditScore.description: Credit score calculated by using the sub-form risk classification in the customer registration/maintenance routines

parentCompany.description: Refers to another customer that has been linked to the current customer. I.e. the parent customer that owns the current customer. Used by the frame agreement concept to define a linked parent company

overDueFeeExtralineCode.description: Overdue fee extra line code. Only applicable if OverDue Debit Type=3. Extra line that shall be used when overdue fee is created.

overDueFeeAmount.description: Overdue fee amount. Only applicable if OverDue Debit Type=3. Overdue fee amount to be invoiced

overDueFeeDays.description: "Overdue fee days. Only applicable if Overdue Debit Type=3. Number of days between due date and payment date where only a fee is to be created. Which fee that is used is defined as overdue fee at customer level. If this day span is exceeded, overdue interest will also be calculated from due date + (Fee - Numberofdays) up to payment date by using OverDue Fee Interest Rate. Used as suggested value when new contracts are registered

overDueFeeInterestRate.description: Overdue fee interest rate. Only applicable if Overdue Debit Type=3. Overdue interest rate that will be used after OverDue Fee Days has been exceeded. Used as suggested value when new contracts are registered

licenseNumber13B.description: 13B license number. The customers VAT 13B License Number. Only applicable/visible in specific countries

expireDate13B.description: 13B expire date. Displays the date the VAT 13 exempt expires. Only applicable/visible in specific countries

vatCode13B.description: Displays the date the VAT 13 exempt expires. Only applicable/visible in specific countries.

includeInIncrease.description: Defines if the Include in Increase Calculation should be automatically enabled/checked, when new contracts are entered for the specific customer. 0=No; 1=Yes

badDebtTable1.description: Bad debt table 1. Bad debt classification item 1. Is set by using the bad debt maintenance routine to classify the customer in different ways

badDebtTable2.description: Bad debt table 2. Bad debt classification item 2. Is set by using the bad debt maintenance routine to classify the customer in different ways

badDebtTable3.description: Bad debt table 3. Bad debt classification item 3. Is set by using the bad debt maintenance routine to classify the customer in different ways

badDebtTable4.description: Bad debt table 4. Bad debt classification item 4. Is set by using the bad debt maintenance routine to classify the customer in different ways

badDebtText1.description: Bad debt text 1. Is set by using the bad debt maintenance routine to classify the customer in different ways

badDebtText2.description: Bad debt text 2. Is set by using the bad debt maintenance routine to classify the customer in different ways

badDebtText3.description: Bad debt text 3. Is set by using the bad debt maintenance routine to classify the customer in different ways

badDebtText4.description: Bad debt text 4. Is set by using the bad debt maintenance routine to classify the customer in different ways

badDebtStatus.description: Bad debt status for the customer. Is set by using the bad debt maintenance routine.

timestamp.description: System field. Used to handle concurrent updates of a customer record

dunsNumber.description: Duns number. Only relevant when the ProFront module is installed. Used for storage of the customer's identity at Dun & Bradstreet if applicable

collection.description: Collection. Is automatically set if any customer invoice is included in the collection Id interface (B1 - Import Collection Data) execution

eInvoicingAddress.description: Customer E-Invoicing identifier. Is mandatory of Document Sending Profile is pre-set to use E-Invoicing

documentSendingProfile.description: Document sending profile. The document sending profile that the customer will normally use to receive invoices, reminders and other documents

transactionType.description: Transaction type. Transaction Type for booking of e.g. On Account Payments. Is set at initial registration with transaction type set on the selected Customer Type

restrictedAccess.description: Restricted access. Defines if the customer has been set as restricted access. 0=No; 1=Yes. If=1 then only users that have the restricted access options set as active will be able to see the customer. If the user does not have restricted access, then the customer will not be visible anywhere for that user

registrationDate.description: Registration date. The date when the customer was initially registered

scrambled.description: Scrambled. Defines if the customer has been scrambled. 0=No; 1=Yes. Refers to specific customer fields that have been defined for scrambling.

lastChangedDate.description: Last change date for this object
Last change date for this object
Last change date for this object
Last change date for this object
Last change date for this object

creditor.description: Creditor = Supplier. Link to supplier in table Supplier

writeOffCharge.description: Defines if Charge should be written off. 0 = No; 1 = Yes

writeOffOverdueInterest.description: Defines if Overdue interest should be written off. 0 = No; 1 = Yes

scheduledPaymentTerms.description: Defines if Self-invoicing calculation has payment terms conditions. 0 = No; Manual; No date conditions; 1 = Yes; Scheduled terms; Conditions must be met; Check if day exists in CreditorAgreementPaymentCriteria;

partPaymentEnabled.description: Defines if Part-payment contract creation is available on Creditor agreement. 0 = No; 1 = Yes

regressEnabled.description: Defines if  Regress is available on Creditor agreement. 0 = No; 1 = Yes

regressNumberOfDays.description: Regress number of days. Day limit restriction before selecting invoice for Regress calculation.

regressMinimumAmount.description: Regress minimum amount. Minimum amount restriction before selecting invoice for Regress calculation

collectionEnabled.description: Defines if  Collection is available on Creditor agreement. 0 = No; 1 = Yes

collectionNumberOfDays.description: Collection number of days. Day limit restriction before selecting invoice for Collection calculation.

collectionMinimumAmount.description: Collection minimum amount. Minimum amount restriction before selecting invoice for Collection calculation

currencyCode.description: Currency code. Link to table CurrencyCode.

graceDaysReminder.description: Reminder grace days. Extra Day span before creating additional reminder invoice during Reminder update

graceDaysOverdueInterest.description: Overdue grace days. Day limit restriction before any debit of overdue interest is executed

overdueInterestRate.description: Overdue interest rate. Interest rate used for calculating overdue interest amount

interestType.description: Interest type. Basis for Interest changes

interestBaseDate.description: Interest base date.  Interest Type date for Creditor Agreement

interestBase.description: Interest Base rate. Interest Type base value for Creditor agreement

interestMargin.description: Interest Margin rate. Interest Type margin value for Creditor agreement

interestAdjustment.description: Interest Adjustment rate. Interest Type adjustment value for Creditor agreement

annualFee.description: For informational purposes. Not used in our system

borrowingBaseAmount.description: Current Creditor agreement Borrowing base amount

balanceAccountAmount.description: Current Creditor agreement Balance account amount

limitRemainingAmount.description: Current Creditor agreement remaining Limit amount

paymentToleranceAmount.description: Payment tolerance. Defines amount that is allowed to deviate from invoice payment on Creditor agreement

directPaymentPercent.description: Direct payment percent. Current Creditor agreement Advance percent. Takes values from interval [0, 100]

reminderGroup.description: Reminder group. Reminder group for Creditor Agreement. Link to table TextCodes.

transactionType.description: Transaction type. Link to table TransactionType.

productTemplate.description: Creditor agreement product. Link to table CreditorAgreementProduct.

productType.description: Product type. Link to table CreditorAgreementProductType

numberOfReminder.description: Number of Reminder on Creditor Agreement

numberOfRoundingDecimalsOfFees.description: Number of rounding decimals of fees

cleringNo.description: Clearing no. Clearing number retrieved via the selected Bank

Default.description: Defines one bank account that shall be used as the default account. The default bank is displayed as initial value when new contracts are entered.

iBANPrint.description: IBAN definition for use in printed output if applicable

timestamp.description: System field. Used to handle concurrent updates of a customer bank record.

extra1.description: Extra 1. Optional field that may be applicable if extended Bank account concept is in use

extra2.description: Extra 2. Optional field that may be applicable if extended Bank account concept is in use

addressCode.description: Address Code identifying a specific address

responsibel.description: Responsible user at the portfolio owner side

contactPerson.description: Contract person at the supplier side

sortName.description: Is normally the same as Supplier name. Is used in most search routines

creditLimit.description: Credit Limit. Not used. Only informative purpose

creditLimitDate.description: Credit limit end date. Not used. Only informative purpose

selfInvoicing.description: Self invoicing. Defines if the self invoicing routine shall process a specific supplier at self invoicing, 0 = No, 1 = Yes

rentPrimaryType1.description: Rent primary type 1. Commission type for period commission

percentageRentPrimary1.description: Percentage rent primary 1. Commission percentage for Rent Primary Type1

capitalizedType.description: Capitalized type. Commission type for capitalized commission

capitalizedPercentageRent.description: Capitalized percentage rent. Commission percentage for Capitalized Type

capitalizedCommissionReceiver.description: Capitalized commission receiver. Commission receiver for capitalized commission

annuityCommissionReceiver.description: Annuity commission receiver. Commission receiver for period commission

capitalizedContactPerson.description: Capitalized contact person. Contact person at the Capitalized Commission Receiver

annuityContactPerson.description: Annuity commission receiver. Contact person at the Annuity Commission Receiver

payWhenPaidFixed.description: Pay when paid fixed. Defines rule for how fixed service invoices shall be paid to the supplier versus the customer service invoices. 0=Pay When Due; 1=Pay When Paid; 2=Pay When Billed

payWhenPaidVariable.description: Pay when paid variable. Defines rule for how variable service invoices shall be paid to the supplier versus the customer service invoices. 0=Pay When Due; 1=Pay When Paid

whenSelfInvoicing.description: When self invoicing. Setting for when self invoicing of fixed service shall be triggered. 0=At AR Invoicing; 1=At Payment Term Fulfilled

additionalDaysPwB.description: Additional days PwB. Only applicable if Pay When Paid Fixed = 2. Number of days. Supplier service invoice cannot be paid until a defined number of days, after the invoice date of the corresponding customer service charge invoice, has passed

privateLabel.description: Private label. Private Labels allow branding of reports (e.g. customer invoices) connected to different partners

linkedToCustomer.description: Linked to customer. Settlement invoices can only be sent to customers. In order to invoice settlement to the Supplier/CCSS of the contract, this option can be used. By entering the supplier

settlementReasonChurn.description: Settlement reason churn. Link to Settlement Reason in table SettlementReason. If set, then the settlement reason will be used in the quote routine if contracts, where the supplier is used, is calculated for churn value

settlementReasonWalkaway.description: Settlement reason walkaway. If set, then the settlement reason will be used in the quote routine if contracts, where the supplier is used, is calculated for walkaway value

calculationMethodChurn.description: Calculation method churn. Calculation method that will be used, if set, in the quote routine if contracts, where the supplier is used, is calculated for churn value

calculationMethodWalkaway.description: Calculation method walkaway. Calculation method that will be used, if set, in the quote routine if contracts, where the supplier is used, is calculated for walkaway value

calcParamPercChurn.description: Calc parameter percentage churn. Calculation percentage that will be used, if set, in the quote routine if contracts, where the supplier is used, is calculated for churn value

calcParamPercWalkaway.description: Calc parameter percentage walkaway. Calculation percentage that will be used, if set, in the quote routine if contracts, where the supplier is used, is calculated for walkaway value

legalForm.description: Legal form. Only applicable for self invoicing of supplier fixed service invoices. If the field shall be used or not depends on if the business wants to use the field. It must then in turn be included in the invoice layout for self invoicing.

shareCapitalAmount.description: Share capital amount. Only applicable for self invoicing of supplier fixed service invoices. If the field shall be used or not depends on if the business wants to use the field. It must then in turn be included in the invoice layout for self invoicing

rcsNumber.description: RCS number. Only applicable for self invoicing of supplier fixed service invoices. If the field shall be used or not depends on if the business wants to use the field. It must then in turn be included in the invoice layout for self invoicing

nafCode.description: NAF code. Only applicable for self invoicing of supplier fixed service invoices. If the field shall be used or not depends on if the business wants to use the field. It must then in turn be included in the invoice layout for self invoicing

taxPaidAtPaymRec.description: Tax paid at payment received. Only applicable for self invoicing of supplier fixed service invoices. If the field shall be used or not depends on if the business wants to use the field. It must then in turn be included in the invoice layout for self invoicing

lastRunDate.description: Last run date. Last date the supplier was included in a self invoicing execution

mandateSignatureDate.description: Mandate signature date. Date/time when the supplier was created.

timestamp.description: System field. Used to handle concurrent updates of a supplier record

invoiceLayoutSI_ID.description: Invoice layout SI ID. Invoice layout to use for self invoicing

transactionType.description: Transaction type. Transaction Type for booking of e.g. supplier invoices and payments

addressCode.description: Address code. Unique customer address identifier for entered address items. The main customer address is not considered as a invoice address item

email.description: Used if the document profile for the user is pre-set for E-mail

eInvoicingAddress.description: Used if the document profile for the user is pre-set for E-Invoicing

officialAddress.description: Official Address.  0=No; 1=Yes. Official invoice address is used for sending invoice

chargeAmount.description: Charge amount. Is used as default value when a specific charge code is selected during registration of a charge

repeatToExtensionPeriodEnd.description: Repeat to end of contract tenor. Creates charges in all future periods if activated. 0=No; 1=Yes. Is used as default value when a specific charge code is selected during registration of a charge

separateLine.description: Defines it a charge code shall be created as a separate line on the invoice. 0=No; 1=Yes. Is used as initial default setting when new charges are created using a specific charge code

defaultAccount.description: Default account. 0=No; 1=Yes. Default account is displayed as initial value in the supplier invoice payment routine

ibanPrint.description: IBAN print. Optional field that can be used to control if IBAN is to be printed on documents or not. Requires adaption of print logic

Bearer.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. Example: "Authorization: Bearer {token}"
Bearer.name: Authorization
